snippet: China’s exports beat market expectations while inflation there held steady, increasing optimism about the health of the global economy and leading United States markets to gains.
abstract: Stock market moves sharply higher after upbeat data from China increases optimism about health of global economy.
lead_paragraph: China’s exports beat market expectations while inflation there held steady, increasing optimism about the health of the global economy and leading United States markets to gains.

headline.main: Sunnier Data From China Lifts Wall Street Trading
headline.print_headline: Sunnier Data From China Lifts Wall Street Trading
